If the cluster is within a Host and Cluster folder, provide the relative path from after the datacenter to the cluster, including all intermediate Host and Cluster folders. Example: Direct name: Cluster1, Relative path: Cluster_Folder/Cluster_Sub_Folder/Cluster1.

Example: Direct name: Datacenter1, Absolute path: /Root_Folder/Datacenter_Folder/Datacenter_Sub_Folder/Datacenter1.
